Pre-Game Insights: The defending champions face a must-win clash to keep their semis ambitions alive.
USA, who have been a revelation in the tournament, are still winless in the Super 8s.
England will lock horns against USA in their final match of the Super 8s stage in the ongoing T20 World Cup 2024.
England has two points from two games – with one defeat and one victory.
The Three Lions started strong with a win against co-hosts West Indies but then lost against the Proteas.
The defending champions will need to churn out a win to keep their semi-finals qualification hopes alive.
USA managed to upset a cricketing powerhouse like Pakistan and advanced to the Super 8s.
USA has lost both encounters so far and their qualification chances look bleak.
USA team will hope to end their campaign on a high with a win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Kensington Oval in Barbados is a good pitch offering equal assistance to both batters and bowlers.
As the game progresses, expect the pitch to get slightly sluggish and can benefit the pacers using cutters and slower balls.
The maximum temperature is expected to be around 32°C with 40 percent chance of rainfall.
